posts.post_content:
Just picked this Fingerpoint backstamped Congalton up off ebay:

[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/1909-1911-T206-SWEET-CAPORAL-BUNK-CONGALTON-PSA-3-MK-2585-/141581026488?pt=LH_DefaultDomain_0&hash=item20f6e304b8[/url]

I know several members are interested in cards with backstamps I'd be willing to resell or preferably trade for a player with sovereign back.   PM me if interested.

Thanks Bob.
